charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
the beach one day, when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into a familiar
face near the water’s edge.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_0300: Phew! Thanks for helping me out there!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0401_0500: Yep! She can be so naughty sometimes...
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0402_0700:
I guess that’s what Vaporeon’s trying to do...but
she just ran off on her own!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_0800: Come on, Vaporeon! I told you to wait for me!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0401_1300: Yeah... Maybe a little TOO energetic sometimes...
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0402_1500:
Yeah. I’m glad she’s having fun and all, but she
sure can be a handful sometimes!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_1600: We’ve been together since my Kanto days.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_1700:
From the moment we met, she’s always been a
little rascal.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_1800:
And she starts fooling around the moment I take
my eyes off her!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_1900: You saw what she did earlier, yeah?
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2000: Once she’s in the water, she’s impossible to find!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2100:
Every day I spend with her can turn into a
wild adventure!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2200: It can be tiring at times, but y’know what?
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2300: She’s still my pride and joy.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2400:
Because of all that energy she has, we won’t lose
to anyone.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2500:
And she has the stamina to keep up with even the
toughest of my training sessions!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2600:
As a Trainer, I’ve been trying to build on that
strength so she can use it to her advantage.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2700:
But of course, all the sync pairs here on Pasio are
super strong, so we can’t just focus on what she’s
already good at...
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2800:
We also have to make sure we strengthen up in
other areas, too!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_2900:
For example...we could use some of Vaporeon’s
tricky moves to throw opponents off their game!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0301_3200: I guess she agrees with you!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0302_3400: Maybe she heard what you said.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0402_3500:
I guess so. She must’ve realized that we were
talking about her.
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_3600:
Vaporeon, I wanna keep getting stronger together
with you, OK? So can we cut down just a bit on
the goofing off?
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_3700:
Oh, by the way! Wanna help us train today by
battling us?
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_0402_4100: Awesome! I knew you’d be up for it!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_4200:
Battling’s the best way to get stronger, in
my opinion!
charaepi_ch0110_10_kasumi/2301_1201_4300:
Let’s see how good your teamwork with your
partner Pokémon is now! Maybe I’ll learn a thing
or two!
